name: TAGGLE (Raoph, Reborn_FLD)
description:
TAGGLE As its name says : a TAG GAME!

Launch the game, choose a region to play (bottom right of the main menu), and get matched with another random player !

  •  Move with WASD
  •  Dash with E 
  •  Attack with LEFT MOUSE BUTTON.

Hitting your enemy gives you 1 more second on your timer (bottom left of the the screen). 

First player to reach 0 second on his timer will loose the game. 

You can also check your enemy’s timer on the top left of the screen. 

The player with the higher timer will have a higher CD on its dash, so you can catch him easily.

Chose the strat that fits you the best, fight or hit and run !
